privacy_policy.points_policy_content:
1. Points Fund: For every dinar spent in our application, the customer earns one point in his fund or the fund of any other customer.
2. Points validity:
• Points remain valid for use for 12 month from the invoice date.
• After this period, unused points expire and cannot be redeemed.
3. Redeeming points:
• Customers can redeem their points for rewards and special offers, such as electronic devices, travel tickets, hotel reservations, or cash back.
• The value of points and redemption rewards is determined according to a specific schedule that is updated periodically.
4. Additional terms and conditions:
• Customers must log in to their accounts to collect and redeem points.
• Points cannot be transferred between accounts or exchanged for cash.
privacy_policy.delivery_return_policy_content: Dear Customer, We at Souq Algomlah E-Commerce believe that customer service is the cornerstone of our whole business. We do our best to avoid any issues that may arise during your shopping experience with us, which is why we make sure that all of our policies are transparent and simple, and if you need any clarification please feel free to contact us directly.
privacy_policy.exchange_or_return_content:
1- You have the right to exchange or return the goods purchased from Souq Algomlah Association within 15 days from the date of purchase if the following conditions are met:

1- That the goods to be returned or exchanged have a manufacturing defect that cannot be repaired without compromising the quality of the goods, or the goods are fraudulent, counterfeit, defective, or do not conform to the specifications mentioned on the Souq Algomlah website.

2- The goods must be in carton and in the same condition at the time of purchase, with all accessories

3- The merchandise must be in good condition and displayable (except for the merchandise in which a manufacturing defect was found, fraudulent or counterfeit). 

4- Food items (unless they have expired at the time of delivery) and personal products (including but not limited to hair removal machines, razors, hygiene products, toothbrushes, hair dryers, etc.) are not eligible for returns or exchanges.

2- You have the right, dear customer, to receive the price of the goods that were returned in the same way that it was paid

3- You have the right, dear customer, to receive the price of the goods that have been fully returned, and you will not deduct any kind of fees such as visa card fees, Knet card fees, or the like from the refund amount.

4- You have the right to receive the price of the returned goods within ten days from the date of accepting the return of the goods 

 5- You have the right, dear customer, to replace the purchased goods within 14 days from the date of purchase, provided that the goods are in the original, unused packaging and with all its accessories.

6-Fresh meat return policy: Inspection of the fresh meat section is only upon delivery, and customers have the right to return the product at the same time when receiving the order.
privacy_policy.delivery_policy_content:
1- We will deliver your orders in Kuwait through the company's fleet, and from time to time we will use specialized companies to deliver those orders.

2- Orders will be delivered according to the delivery method you choose. At Souq Algomlah, we provide two shipping methods, which are immediate delivery within 3 hours and delivery at the specific times that you choose during the purchase process.

3- If you are not at the specified address, we will deliver the order to any person present at this address and sign it on the invoice electronically or on the invoice copy.  

4- If the address specified by you has been reached and we cannot deliver the order, please contact the customer service to set another date for the delivery of the order. The company is not responsible for any order that has not been delivered within a month from the date of the order.
privacy_policy.data_collected: What data does it collect and use?
privacy_policy.data_collected_content: You provide us with information when you interact with our products and services, which we store and use securely to improve your shopping experience. Common ways you provide us with information include searching for products or services, completing an order, or contacting us for assistance. Some of the information you may provide includes contact information, delivery information, payment information, or other preferences.
privacy_policy.data_collection_use: How does the Souq Algomlah use my data?
privacy_policy.data_collection_use_content:
We use your personal information to provide and improve our services. Some examples include delivering Products, communicating with you about your purchases of products and services, improving and personalizing your experience with the Services, and complying with legal obligations, among others.

We also use your personal information to display interest-based advertisements for features, products and services that may be of interest to you. We do not use your personally identifiable information to display interest-based ads. You can learn more in the Interest-Based Advertising Notice. We use cookies to enable our systems to recognize your browser or device, and to provide our services.
privacy_policy.data_security: How does Souq Algomlah maintain the security of my data?
privacy_policy.data_security_content:
We design all of our systems and devices with your privacy in mind, and have invested in ensuring the security of your data in all areas of communication across our business. We maintain physical, electronic and procedural safeguards regarding the collection, storage and disclosure of personal customer information. Our security procedures mean that from time to time we may ask for proof of identity before we disclose personal information to you.

Information about our customers is an important part of our business and we are not in the business of selling personal information to others. We may share your personal information with third parties, but only in order to provide the Services or to comply with applicable laws.
